list.name: Default
list.comment: Prototype finished! One can now link layout and sample spots and export them as CSV file! Many other smaller improvements

task.summary: layout changes can now be saved and actual state is shown. sorting of layoutspot has been corrected. menu css has been changed and menu is restructured. legend is now an overlay draggable. added dilution and lysis buffer to layout specifics. layout operations seem currently stable! :-)
Prototype finished! One can now link layout and sample spots and export them as CSV file! Many other smaller improvements
